characters.story: To dine with food sings "Tsan!" cheerfully eating together - repast shared!
Building food official bends down drooping saying "Gwan" - public establishment house!
To raise sheep and food bends down drooping saying "Yang" - rearing and keeping!
Since food done commands "Ji!" sharply - already de facto!
Approximate tree already commands "Gai!" sharply - general outline!
Even ground flat questions "Ping? Level?" curiously balanced!
To evaluate words even questions "Ping? Fair judgment?" curiously criticizing!
Level ground earth even questions "Ping? Flat plain?" curiously measuring two-mat area!
"Ooh!" exclaims cheerfully singing "Hoo!" high with surprise!
To shout mouth ooh sings "Hoo!" cheerfully exhaling loudly!
To hope cloth scarce sings "Shee!" cheerfully expecting the rare!
Scarce grain hope sings "Shee!" cheerfully sparse and diluted!
To study child roof questions "Shueh? Learning?" curiously - science and -ology!
Senses study see questions "Jueh? Aware?" curiously waking to consciousness!
To stir hand senses bends down drooping saying "Jiao" - mixing and disturbing!
Sinister box opening sings "Shyong!" terribly - ominous villain within!
Cruel sinister brother sings "Shyong!" brutally - ferocious and atrocious!
Bosom flesh cruel sings "Shyong!" powerfully - chest and heart!
